wukong!'s commands
==================
admin
-----
+------------------+---------------------------------+---------------------------+----------------------+
| command          | description                     | usage                     | aliases              |
+==================+=================================+===========================+======================+
| lang             | changes the server language     | w!lang <language code>    | setlang              |
+------------------+---------------------------------+---------------------------+----------------------+
| prefix           | change the server prefix        | w!prefix <new prefix>     | setprefix            |
+------------------+---------------------------------+---------------------------+----------------------+

developer
---------
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| command          | description                      | usage                                  | aliases                |
+==================+==================================+========================================+========================+
| eval             | evaluates js                     | w!eval <javascript code>               | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| msgchannel       | sends message to a channel       | w!msgchannel <channel id> <message>    | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| msgdm            | sends message to an id's dm      | w!msgdm <user id> <message>            | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| togglepremium    | toggle premium for a server      | w!togglepremium <server id>            | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| userblacklist    | toggle blacklist for user id     | w!userblacklist <user id>              | blacklistuser          |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+

fun
---
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| command          | description                      | usage                                  | aliases                |
+==================+==================================+========================================+========================+
| emojify          | turns text into copypasta        | w!emojify <text>                       | emojipasta             |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| enchantify       | turns text into enchantment table| w!enchantify <text>                    | enchant                |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| randomcase       | randomcases text                 | w!randomcase <text>>                   | rc                     |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| reverse          | reverses text                    | w!reverse <text>                       | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+

general
-------
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| command          | description                      | usage                                  | aliases                |
+==================+==================================+========================================+========================+
| avatar           | get someone's avatar             | w!avatar <mention>                     | pfp, picture, icon     |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| calc             | calculates math expression       | w!calc <math expression>               | math                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| help             | get information about command    | w!help <command>                       | commands, usage        |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| info             | bot statistics                   | w!info                                 | botstats, botinfo      |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| invite           | wukong!'s invite url             | w!invite                               | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| premium          | check server premium status      | w!premium                              | vip                    |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| roles            | list of all roles in the server  | w!roles                                | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| server           | support server invite            | w!server                               | support                |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| servericon       | get the server icon              | w!servericon                           | serverpfp              |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
| serverinfo       | get information about the server | w!serverinfo                           | none                   |
+------------------+----------------------------------+----------------------------------------+------------------------+
